name: Ultra Necrozma GX
author: PLANETA Igarashi

attacks.name: Photon Geyser
attacks.effect: Discard all basic {P} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Sky-Scorching Light GX
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if the total of both players’ remaining Prize cards is 6 or less. Put 6 damage counters on each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
